title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains why the Cowboys should not be considered a Super Bowl contender before the 2022 season even begins. He believes one young QB could be replaced after only a few games into the new season. He elevates Jim Harbaugh as one of the greatest football coaches of all time and why he's accomplished more then 7 time National Champion Nick Saban. Plus, Fox Sports college football analyst Joel Klatt joins the show to look at Texas vs Alabama. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
